summary: App build/deploy project with prompt-loading functionality; currently experiencing prompt loading failures and needs a visible footer version label (target v15).
architectural_notes: Add a persistent footer UI element that reads the current app/build version string (e.g., 'v15').
Improve prompts fetch pipeline: handle network errors, validate/parse response schema, and provide resilient error handling for invalid server data.

Add a visible app version label to the bottom/footer so users can verify they are on the latest build; display the exact string “v15” in the footer UI.
